articles.title: Cyberpunk 2077: Phantom Liberty - an ambitious evolution targeting today's consoles - Eurogamer.net
articles.description: Plus: has the 2.0 upgrade delivered tech improvements to the established game?
articles.content: Cyberpunk 2077 has come a long way. First released in December 2020, the open-world RPG was saddled with technical issues, including bugs and very poor frame-rates on last-gen console systems. Sony e… [+10137 chars]

articles.author: HT Tech
articles.title: Apple to roll out macOS Sonoma today! Check out top 5 features, supported Macs and more - HT Tech
articles.description: After months of rigorous testing, Apple is finally set to roll out macOS Sonoma today, September 26. Know its release time, top features, supported Macs, and more.
articles.content: After months of testing, Apple will today finally release macOS 14, popularly known as macOS Sonoma, its latest OS for Macs. It was announced at Apple's World Wide Developers Conference (WWDC) 2023 o… [+2446 chars]
